description: Updates the directory for a particular update type.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the directory on which you want to perform the update.

parameters.name: UpdateType
parameters.description: The type of update that needs to be performed on the directory. For example, OS.

parameters.name: OSUpdateSettings
parameters.description: The settings for the OS update that needs to be performed on the directory. OSVersion (string) --- OS version that the directory needs to be updated to.

nested_params.name: OSVersion
nested_params.description: OS version that the directory needs to be updated to.
